member.name: T:InvestmentAnalysis.Portfolio.Finam.FinamCurrency
member.summary: Provides helper methods for currency management.

member.name: M:InvestmentAnalysis.Portfolio.Finam.FinamCurrency.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a currency to its ISO 4217 equivalent implemented by Currency.
member.param: A string containing a currency to convert.
member.returns: A ISO 4217 equivalent to the currency specified in value.
